resources.string: Please specify the settings for Telegram

The application forwards all notifications from your phone to Telegram via a bot. Note: The Telegram Bot API token and the chat ID must be specified during the application setup. Additionally, you will soon be able to filter and forward notifications only from selected apps. The application requires permissions to access the network and notifications.
Enter the Telegram bot API key
Please fill in both fields correctly

To obtain your Telegram chat ID, go to the bot @get_id_bot.

To obtain the API key for the Telegram bot, go to the bot @BotFather.

After receiving the necessary data, enter it in the corresponding fields.

Steps to set up the application:

1. Press the central button to grant permission to access all notifications.
2. After that, click the #Go to settings# button.
3. Enter the chat ID and the API key for the Telegram bot, then save the data by pressing the #Save# button.
4. In the same window, go to the #Applications# section and select which applications you want to forward notifications from.
5. Returning to the main screen, press the #Enable service# button.

To obtain your Telegram chat ID, go to the bot @get_id_bot:
- Open Telegram and search for @get_id_bot.
- Start a chat with the bot and follow the instructions to get your chat ID.

To obtain the API key for the Telegram bot, go to the bot @BotFather:
- Open Telegram and search for @BotFather.
- Start a chat with the bot and follow the instructions to create a new bot. After creation, you will receive an API key.

After receiving the necessary data, enter it in the corresponding fields.

"
 The application is designed to save and forward smartphone notifications to a Telegram chat. 
 Its use is allowed only on the user's own devices and is strictly prohibited for spying on other people.
 
 Legal disclaimer:
 The developer is not responsible for any improper use of the application. 
 The user uses the application at their own risk and agrees not to use it for purposes that violate the law, 
 infringe on the rights and freedoms of others, or engage in illegal activities.
 
 Using this application implies acceptance of the stated terms.
 "
